p: Sivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.
q: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.
w: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.
e: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.
r: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.
